price: 6. Kaadu Qaad deqsita marah tu gactek, Yalli kaxxa xongoloo kee xabca Íe caacayay caddok tatret ken finqise.
arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā ʿādun fa-uh'likū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ʿātiyatin
